project.title: meepShop official website
project.desc: This website makeover project was my very first task when I entered meepShop Inc. as a frontend developer, it's also responsive and platform friendly.

project.title: tresor
project.desc: This is a second-hand trading platform, it begins with a simple idea that students who want to sell their stuff like textbook, clothing, or even staple, to other students, need a place to post this information and can immediately connect with the buyer.
